manifest.ext.name: Dates-LE
manifest.ext.description: Zero Hassle Date/Time Extraction and Analysis from Logs, Configs, and Code
manifest.command.extract.title: Extract Dates
manifest.command.dedupe.title: Deduplicate Dates
manifest.command.sort.title: Sort Dates
manifest.command.analyze.title: Analyze Dates
manifest.command.convert.title: Convert Dates
manifest.command.filter.title: Filter Dates
manifest.command.validate.title: Validate Dates
manifest.command.settings.title: Open Settings
manifest.command.help.title: Help & Troubleshooting
manifest.settings.title: Dates-LE Settings
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: Automatically copy extraction results to the clipboard
manifest.settings.dedupe.desc: Enable automatic deduplication of extracted dates
manifest.settings.open.new-file.desc: Open post-processed content in a new editor
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: Open extraction results in a new editor to the side
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: Enable safety checks for large files and operations
Warn when input file size exceeds this threshold in bytes
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: Warn before opening/copying when result lines exceed this threshold
manifest.settings.safety.warn.many-docum: Warn before opening multiple result documents when count exceeds this threshold
manifest.settings.parse-errors.desc: Show parse errors as VS Code notifications when parsing fails
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: Show Dates-LE status bar entry for quick access
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: Enable local-only telemetry logs to the Output panel
manifest.settings.csv.streaming.desc: Enable streaming mode for large CSV files to reduce memory usage
manifest.settings.analysis.enabled.desc: Enable automatic analysis of extracted dates
manifest.settings.output.format.option.r: RFC 2822 (ddd, DD MMM YYYY HH:mm:ss Z)
manifest.settings.performance.max-durati: Maximum processing duration in milliseconds before warning
manifest.settings.performance.max-memory: Maximum memory usage in bytes before warning
manifest.settings.performance.max-cpu.de: Maximum CPU usage in milliseconds before warning
manifest.settings.performance.min-throug: Minimum throughput in dates per second before warning
Maximum cache size in entries before cleanup
manifest.settings.keyboard.shortcuts.ena: Enable keyboard shortcuts for quick access to Dates-LE commands
manifest.settings.keyboard.extract.short: Keyboard shortcut for extracting dates from current document
manifest.settings.keyboard.dedupe.shortc: Keyboard shortcut for deduplicating extracted dates
manifest.settings.keyboard.sort.shortcut: Keyboard shortcut for sorting extracted dates
manifest.settings.keyboard.convert.short: Keyboard shortcut for converting date formats
manifest.settings.keyboard.analyze.short: Keyboard shortcut for analyzing extracted dates
manifest.settings.presets.enabled.desc: Enable preset configurations for different use cases
manifest.settings.presets.default.option: Comprehensive - Full analysis with all features
runtime.warning.large-file: Large file detected ({0}). Processing may take time.
runtime.warning.memory-usage: High memory usage detected ({0}). Consider reducing file size.
runtime.warning.performance: Performance threshold exceeded. Processing may be slow.
runtime.info.analysis-complete: Analysis complete. Generated report with {0} sections.
runtime.safety.output-size-warning: Output size ({0} lines) exceeds threshold. Continue?
runtime.help.title: Dates-LE Help
runtime.help.quick-start:
1. Open a JSON, YAML, or CSV file
2. Run "Dates-LE: Extract Dates"
3. View extracted dates in results
runtime.help.commands:
**Extract Dates**: Extract from current document
**Sort Dates**: Sort chronologically or alphabetically
**Deduplicate Dates**: Remove duplicate dates
**Settings**: Configure options
runtime.help.formats:
**Supported**: JSON, YAML, CSV
**Date Formats**: ISO 8601, RFC 2822, Unix timestamp, UTC, Local, Custom
runtime.help.troubleshooting:
**No dates found?** Check file format and date patterns
**Performance issues?** Enable safety settings for large files
**Need help?** Check Output panel for details
runtime.help.settings:
Access via Command Palette: "Dates-LE: Open Settings"
Key settings: Copy to clipboard, deduplication, output format, timezone
